description:
Mind Tricks - Are you smart? How strong is your mind?
Watch this and learn how to be smart or more intelligent.

If you like my work, please join me on my social networks!

Funny Brain games. Best Mind and Brain Tricks.
IQ Test / Intelligence Quotient Test - Trick questions.

ANSWERS AND EXPLANATIONS:

A1:  TRUE
Explanation: Because the first two statements are true, raspberries are the most expensive of the three.

A2:  TRUE
Explanation: There are fewer oranges than either apples or lemons, so the statement is true. 
Easy method: (Try this method to solve without any confusion) 
1. A fruit basket contains more apples than lemons = APP greater than LEM 
2. There are more lemons in the basket than there are oranges = LEM greater than ORG 
Now, Combine the above two results: APP greater than LEM greater than ORG 
3. The basket contains more apples than oranges (APP greater than ... ORG) = Yes.
Therefore, the given 3rd statement is true.

A3:  TRUE
Explanation: We know that there are Signots with buttons, or Lamels, and that there are yellow Signots, which have no buttons. Therefore, Lamels do not have buttons and cannot be yellow.

A4:  2
Explanation: Statement 2 is the only true statement. Since all dogs like to run, then the ones who like to swim also like to run. There is no support for statement 1 or statement 3.


AUDIO: Fly High - Gunnar Olsen (Dance & Electronic  Funky)
title: ✔ MIND TRICKS - TRUE OR FALSE #1
